en.title: WEATHER FORECAST FOR 27 JANUARY 2026 Issued at 2.00 p.m. on 26 January 2026 A few showers may occur in Northern, North-central and Eastern provinces. Showers or thundershowers may occur at few places in Sabaragamuwa province and in Galle and Matara districts after 2.00 p.m. Fairly strong winds of about (30-40) kmph can be expected at times over Eastern slopes of the central hills, Northern, North-central, North-western, Eastern and Uva provinces and in Matara, and Hambantota districts. Misty conditions can be expected at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central and Uva provinces and in Galle and Matara districts during the early hours of the morning. The general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.

р╢Ьр╖Тр╢Ьр╖Фр╢╗р╖Фр╢╕р╖К р╖Гр╖Др╖Тр╢н р╖Ар╖Рр╖Гр╖Т р╖Гр╢╕р╢Ь р╢Зр╢нр╖Тр╖Ар╖Тр╢║ р╖Др╖Рр╢Ър╖Т р╢нр╖Пр╖Ар╢Ър╖Пр╢╜р╖Тр╢Ъ р╢нр╢п р╖Гр╖Фр╖Ер╢В р╖Ар╢╜р╖Тр╢▒р╖К р╖Гр╖Д р╢Ер╢Ър╖Фр╢лр╖Ф р╢╕р╢Яр╖Тр╢▒р╖К р╖Гр╖Тр╢пр╖Ф р╖Ар╢▒ р╢Ер╢▒р╢нр╖Фр╢╗р╖Ф р╢Ер╖Ар╢╕ р╢Ър╢╗ р╢Ьр╖Рр╢▒р╖Ур╢╕р╢з р╢Ер╖Ар╖Бр╖КтАНр╢║ р╢┤р╖Тр╢║р╖Ар╢╗ р╢Ьр╢▒р╖Кр╢▒р╖П р╢╜р╖Щр╖Г р╢вр╢▒р╢нр╖Пр╖Ар╢Ьр╖Щр╢▒р╖К р╢Ър╖Пр╢╗р╖Фр╢лр╖Тр╢Ър╖А р╢Йр╢╜р╖Кр╢╜р╖П р╖Гр╖Тр╢зр╖Тр╢▒р╖Ф р╢╜р╖Рр╢╢р╖Ъ.

WEATHER FORECAST FOR 27 JANUARY 2026

Issued at 2.00 p.m. on 26 January 2026

A few showers may occur in Northern, North-central and Eastern provinces.

Showers or thundershowers may occur at few places in Sabaragamuwa province and in Galle and Matara districts after 2.00 p.m.

Fairly strong winds of about (30-40) kmph can be expected at times over Eastern slopes of the central hills, Northern, North-central, North-western, Eastern and Uva provinces and in Matara, and Hambantota districts.

Misty conditions can be expected at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central and Uva provinces and in Galle and Matara districts during the early hours of the morning.

The general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
